data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hazzi, Nicolás A., Valderrama-Ardila, Carlos, Brescovit Daniele Polotow, Antonio D., Simó, Miguel (2013): New records and geographical distribution of ctenid spiders (Araneae: Ctenidae) in Colombia. Zootaxa 3709 (3): 243-254, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3709.3.3
